Dimension web portal

This was a complete rebuild of our teamâ€™s customer facing web app in JavaScript, TypeScript, React, C# / .NET Core, and Amazon Web Services. The old version was written in vanilla JavaScript and C# / .NET Framework with the Nancy web framework. Features include configuring, scheduling, running, and monitoring data integrations, as well as manually linking and unlinking specific records. It uses Amazon Web Services including S3, RDS, Lambda, and EventBridge.

No proprietary data is shown for this demo/mock company.
